attributes.title: Q and A session  on God, Unclutching®,  BigBang  16 Dec 2010
attributes.description:
In this video His Holiness Bhagawan Sri Nithyananda Paramashivam  answers Inner Awakening participants Questions  about how matter gets created from big bang,  What is brahma?, Bhakthi, clarification on practicing Unclutching®. An eclectic mix of questions being answered in Swamiji's inimitable style - with amazing truths being revealed!




Support the World's Only Hindu Nation: www.kailaasa.org/join-kailaasa
